title: Model Redirect
description: Use AI (OpenAI API) to generate intelligent model name redirect mappings from standard models to available models
enableDesc: Use AI to automatically generate model redirect mappings, matching standard model names to channel-supported models
standardModelsDesc: Select the standard models to generate redirect mappings for

aiConfig.title: AI Configuration
aiConfig.description: Configure OpenAI API for generating model mappings (supports OpenAI-compatible endpoints)
aiConfig.endpointDesc: OpenAI API endpoint URL, supports OpenAI-compatible third-party services
aiConfig.apiKeyDesc: OpenAI API key, will be securely stored locally
aiConfig.modelDesc: Model name for generating mappings (recommended: gpt-4o or gpt-4-turbo)
aiConfig.customPromptPlaceholder: Leave empty to use default prompt template
aiConfig.customPromptDesc: Custom prompt template, use {standardModels} and {availableModels} as placeholders
aiConfig.rateLimitDesc: Control API request rate to avoid hitting limits

mappingRules.title: Mapping Rules
mappingRules.allowedList: Date suffix changes, naming format changes, prefix/org differences
mappingRules.forbiddenList: Version changes, spec changes (e.g. -mini, -70B), variant changes

messages.updateFailed: Failed to update model redirect settings
messages.noModelsSelected: Please select at least one standard model
